name: Space Wing - C64 (1-2 &3 Ep.)
description:
- Space Wing - C64  Vox Videogame & Co. 2019/20

  (Game with 3 distinct episodes)

  I had entered a password system in the game's episodes ... at the end of each episode you will find the password for the next ...  Since someone might find it "unpleasant or boring to enter the passwords to play the next levels, then I made available the passw or the fast loading with the PRG of episodes 1 - 2 and 3. ;-D :-D X-D      ... Space Wing ... game design, graphics and sound effects by Pinov Vox using the Shoot 'Em Up Construction kit by sensible software 1987 and version sideway 2008 by Jon Wells ... kickassembler seuck frontend code by Richard Bayliss "The New Dimension 64 "www.tnd64.unikat.sk ... front end music by Vg Vox ... 2020 ..." Vox Videogame & Co ".... use a joystick port1 or 2 ... press fire to start or press fire to start your travel in the space .

-STORY-

... the alien empire has sent battle cruisers across the galaxy in order to destroy your home planet, Darion ... your mission, should you accept it is to fly across each alien base, and do battle against the aliens ... this will not be an easy battle, as the aliens will of course fight back ... can you save darion from being destroyed, or will you become the next victim of the galactic assault? ... port 2 controls the space ship, port 1 controls the drone ... may the best player win ... press fire to play!
